Uses of Interface
org.springframework.web.socket.server.RequestUpgradeStrategy

  • Packages that use RequestUpgradeStrategy 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.web.socket.server.jetty
    Server-side support for the Jetty 9+ WebSocket API.
    org.springframework.web.socket.server.standard
    Server-side classes for use with standard JSR-356 WebSocket endpoints.
    org.springframework.web.socket.server.support
    Server-side support classes including container-specific strategies for upgrading a request.

    • Uses of RequestUpgradeStrategy in org.springframework.web.socket.server.jetty

      Classes in org.springframework.web.socket.server.jetty that implement RequestUpgradeStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Jetty10RequestUpgradeStrategy
      A RequestUpgradeStrategy for Jetty 10.
      class  JettyRequestUpgradeStrategy
      A RequestUpgradeStrategy for use with Jetty 9.4.

    • Uses of RequestUpgradeStrategy in org.springframework.web.socket.server.standard

      Classes in org.springframework.web.socket.server.standard that implement RequestUpgradeStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStandardUpgradeStrategy
      A base class for RequestUpgradeStrategy implementations that build on the standard WebSocket API for Java (JSR-356).
      class  AbstractTyrusRequestUpgradeStrategy
      A base class for RequestUpgradeStrategy implementations on top of JSR-356 based servers which include Tyrus as their WebSocket engine.
      class  GlassFishRequestUpgradeStrategy
      A WebSocket RequestUpgradeStrategy for Oracle's GlassFish 4.1 and higher.
      class  TomcatRequestUpgradeStrategy
      A WebSocket RequestUpgradeStrategy for Apache Tomcat.
      class  UndertowRequestUpgradeStrategy
      A WebSocket RequestUpgradeStrategy for WildFly and its underlying Undertow web server.
      class  WebLogicRequestUpgradeStrategy
      A WebSocket RequestUpgradeStrategy for Oracle's WebLogic.
      class  WebSphereRequestUpgradeStrategy
      WebSphere support for upgrading an HttpServletRequest during a WebSocket handshake.

    • Uses of RequestUpgradeStrategy in org.springframework.web.socket.server.support

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RequestUpgradeStrategy AbstractHandshakeHandler.getRequestUpgradeStrategy()
      Return the RequestUpgradeStrategy for WebSocket requests.

      Constructor and Description

      A constructor that accepts a runtime-specific RequestUpgradeStrategy.
      DefaultHandshakeHandler(RequestUpgradeStrategy requestUpgradeStrategy)
